nodes.bodyText: Actually, I'm not sure hiding this here helps.  The caller has the domain object and could just call domain.deleteImage().

same goes for domain.destroy() also and don't even need this method destroySitConfigDomain(). I think the method was added here as there are two sit config test classes, so that they both inherit these methods.
destroySitConfigDomain() not really doing much, I can put those two lines in the test class itself.
